name: Statistics & Slimes
description:
Educational game about mathematical statistics.

There are 2 modes:

  1. Playground. Designed to study theory interactively, meaning you can play with the data;
  2. Arena. Designed for practice, you will have to calculate something to beat the slimes.

There are currently 9 playground levels, which deal with the very basics of statistics.

The slimes on the playground can be controlled:

  • Remove/add through the well;
  • Feed them berries to change their sweetness and slipperiness;
  • Dye in puddles.

You can also get hints on what methods there are in python and google sheets that are relevant to the raised topic. This can make it a lot easier to get through the arena, since you can get the data from the arena via a link.
